channel.title: Wizard101
channel.description:
This game is probably designed for 10-13 year olds, but I'm 15 and I love it! To be honest it's down to personal opinion on the games target audience (age wise) but it is very entertaining.
Quote from Moparscape:
[quote="Tom_BETA, post:1, topic:406170"]Most of you have probably never heard/tried this game, but it's amazing. At first I assumed it would be a kiddies game (adventure quest and so on, a game which is so age orientated that it isn't even fun) which is generally boring. It's actually quite a fun game, I would definitely recommend you try it.
https://www.wizard101.com/
I first saw it being advertised on youtube and only started it recently (my name is Tom5001 for those who wish to speak to me).
Wizard101 is a game in which you are a student at a magical school (graphics like WoW imo) you must advance levels and fight numerous NPCs, it also comes with a thriving player base that you can duel and interact with.
There is also a quests system and so on, once you advance levels you can cast better spells which can potentially do more damage to your opposition or heal you/give you an advantage. The entire game is explained in a quick 10 minute interactive tutorial where you fight some guys enemies in a duel.[/quote]
The game requires strategic moves while in duels, this can include casting defensive spells/healing yourself or just relying on plain old luck :|
Though it does have premium options, the free game play is still very extensive and worth trying.
Some fire spell game play:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q5KUC1F3eoo
I've found most people have some objection towards this game, I personally think it's great, if you don't like it mind posting why? It'd be interesting to read I guess.

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Wizard101 is pure family-friendly, child-centric entertainment. The game has a PEGI rating of “suitable for ages 12 and up”. (PEGI 12)

tut tut

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:406224”]Just found out yesterday that the 6 year old girl my mom babysits likes to play this game.

(not implying that any of you are a 6 year old girl… :P)[/quote]
I wouldn’t doubt it, this is like the best Game for young kids, also great for people who like a bit of Fantasy Dueling.

I played this a while back, go to level 10 and became a member then quit.
It is surprisingly fun my little brother showed me it and i was like “Lolnub that looks gay” then i played it, it was actually really cool.

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

I installed and played it for like 2 days before, I didn’t really like it but I haven’t played it enough for my opinion to matter. I can see how you enjoy it but it’s just one of those games I will probably never play again. :o

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @_Ix_Miir_xI .::Ix Miir xI::.
item.description:
@_Ix_Miir_xI wrote:

i played this game about 2 years ago, it does look a bit strange, but as you play more it does become quite addicting. The only problem is when you reach the end of the free play and you can no longer do anything.

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:5, topic:406224”][quote author=mironic link=topic=503221.msg3681429#msg3681429 date=1311552179]

that looks boring o-o

I thought that at first, in fact I found it boring for a little while then something clicked and I now like it >.>

… wait tom… your 15… and you host websites!? wtf D:
[/quote]

What do you mean? I have a Linux server in my room, very much like moparisthebest except his is better

Because I’m still under the watch of my parents I have to make do with what I have, and considering they’re completely computer illiterate that isn’t a lot. One day, I shall be free to build my own computer without restrictions on the random access memory!

Just a little biography there, you know.[/quote]
i see…

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

This game is probably designed for 10-13 year olds, but I’m 15 and I love it! To be honest it’s down to personal opinion on the games target audience (age wise) but it is very entertaining.

Quote from Moparscape:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:1, topic:406170”]Most of you have probably never heard/tried this game, but it’s amazing. At first I assumed it would be a kiddies game (adventure quest and so on, a game which is so age orientated that it isn’t even fun) which is generally boring. It’s actually quite a fun game, I would definitely recommend you try it.

https://www.wizard101.com/

I first saw it being advertised on youtube and only started it recently (my name is Tom5001 for those who wish to speak to me).

Wizard101 is a game in which you are a student at a magical school (graphics like WoW imo) you must advance levels and fight numerous NPCs, it also comes with a thriving player base that you can duel and interact with.

There is also a quests system and so on, once you advance levels you can cast better spells which can potentially do more damage to your opposition or heal you/give you an advantage. The entire game is explained in a quick 10 minute interactive tutorial where you fight some guys enemies in a duel.[/quote]

The game requires strategic moves while in duels, this can include casting defensive spells/healing yourself or just relying on plain old luck

Though it does have premium options, the free game play is still very extensive and worth trying.

Some fire spell game play:

I’ve found most people have some objection towards this game, I personally think it’s great, if you don’t like it mind posting why? It’d be interesting to read I guess.
